section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.para: senlin-manage provides utilities for operators to manage Senlin specific maintenance operations.

section.title: Senlin DB version
section.para: Print out the db schema revision.
Sync the database up to the most recent version.

section.title: FILES
section.para: The /etc/senlin/senlin.conf file contains global options which can be used to configure some aspects of senlin-manage, for example the DB connection and logging options.
